name: Custom Biotics: (x3r0h0ur)
description: I'm going back to bed, but here's a quick idea of what I was talking about in your CB: over advance concept. I think this has a more consistent economy and ways to advance even with EFF comms no advance action requirement. The biggest problem is filling out the INF. This is probably better off as HB: EtF actually.

name: Kate's AI
description: get in anywhere really easily do it cheaply. All breakers can be reassigned to where ever you need them to be. Based on combining two decks by paddosan and xerohour.

name: Basic Personal Evolution
description: The basic Jinteki deck. Net damage to scare the runner off.

name: Basic Personal Evolution
description: The basic Jinteki deck. Net damage to scare the runner off. Enigma will be replaced by swordsman as soon as my Second Thoughts arrives (I had a problem with it here in Brazil)

name: Flash Freeze
description:
Version 1.3 This is the most up-to-date version of a proof-of-concept deck I've been working on. The idea is to quickly gain access to all those expensive, brain-damage inducing bioroid ICE.

You are looking to play ICE with Oversight AI and Awakening Centre first; these will cause the ICE to be trashed eventually, so you want to get that out of the way. If you get a Jackson out early, just mill your deck to get the big ICE and the other cards you need. Feel free to use your Archives as an extra repository for ICE and Assets.

In phase two, you are using Howlers, Interns, Project Vitruvius and Archived Memories to pull the ICE and Assets out of Archives and playing them a second time. By now, you should have some economy and can afford to rez them the old-fashioned way.

The economy is a little slow to get going, but a well-protected MMC is all you need. You can re-use Adonis campaign with Isabel McGuire by bouncing it back to HQ and re-installing it. Its not the most efficient, but it helps.
